title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 225-4.4 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 225-4.4 - Severability

State Regulations

Each provision of this Subpart shall be deemed severable, and in the event that any section of this Subpart is held to be invalid, the
remainder of this Subpart shall continue in full force and
effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
225-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
